alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sullivan, northeastern Cheshire and west central Merrimack Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport, or 8 miles southeast of Claremont, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Charlestown, Bradford, Nelson, Newport, Gilsum, Warner, Alstead, Marlow, Stoddard, Sullivan, Windsor, Roxbury, Walpole, Surry, Hillsborough, Lempster, Acworth, Goshen and Croydon. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 19 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
